website_summaries.verdict: It does its job well, but if you're sensitive to smells, you may be better off with one of our other picks.
pros: Keeps skin smooth and dry without itching

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Babies!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this powder. I am elderly and a large lady, so I needed a medicated powder, with no talcum powder in it, to keep some private areas dry. I was using another brand of medicated powder with no talc, that the hospital here uses, which I loved, but it was pricey. This baby powder was the only other one, medicated and without talc, that I could find on Amazon (or anywhere for that matter). It is the same number of ounces as the other brand, but seems to last longer, costs less and works every bit as well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jw4unity

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies!
customer_reviews.text: Ayyeee!!! I love the way it smells and feels. I just place it on my chest. Not in the undies. I love that it is soft and helps keep the sweat at bay. I use coconut oil underneath my breasts to help with the rashes that I seem to get in the summer or when I sweat too much. But this is an added bonus to my daily rituals!
customer_reviews.author: K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Talcum-Free Baby Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder! My newborn baby girl came down with a severe diaper rash due to a whey allergy. We tried different diaper rash creams, and nothing helped. We needed a dry solution. Our first option was a household baking option:corn starch. Corn starch is not medicated, and only helped to dry our baby's bottom. I noticed that this diaper powder has zinc, which is a must have ingredient for skin care. I purchased this bottle not long ago, and I have already used most of it up. The price is great, and my daughter's diaper rash is gone. I will definitely purchase this powder again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well, and while it may not work as well as talc based powders used to, the current health concerns with talc based products has made me swear off them for the time being. This is a suitable replacement. Comes with plenty of product, easy to clean, doesn't leave marks on clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Wohlfe

customer_reviews.title: Baby Powder not just for Babies...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brought this baby powder for me a couple of years ago. It is very beneficial for rashes and irritation of the skin and I love the way it smells. It's a keeper for me and I am not a baby!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! It gave my baby a rash!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I was so excited to use this on my 5 month old because of the fantastic reviews. She struggles with diaper rashes even though I change her diaper immediately after she soils them. I used it for about a week and it made her diaper rash worse to the point it gave her two big blisters that popped. The smell of this baby powder smells like an old lady’s perfume. It smells just like my grandma’s perfume which I liked. But my daughter has sensitive skin and had a very bad reaction to it. After I discontinued use, her diaper rash along with the blisters have been getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Steerfork

customer_reviews.title: Way better than other baby powders. It helps heal and keep the area dry at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Superior to other cornstarch baby powders because it has zinc oxide in it which is what you find in Desitin, Triple Rash etc. For a stubborn rash, I recommend this with triple paste and lotrimin ultra (if yeast/fungal rash).
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Great and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Really nice powder. No talc. Starch plus kaolin and silica which make it just as silky as talc. The scent is really special. It definitely smells like “baby powder” but also a little bit like root beer or almond extract. The zinc is the most important ingredient, it really stops the chafing rash for me in my armpits and under my boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: For adults too!
customer_reviews.text: The best product for creases and crevices that get irritated in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: No talc and doesn't strain clothes
customer_reviews.text: Gold Bond products always work well for me. I often use baby products on myself because being older (like almost 70) I have delicate skin. I use this powder daily after a shower. I always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Gamache

customer_reviews.title: My body's new BFF!
customer_reviews.text: Ist time trying this. Usually use Johnson's cornstarch but apparently it was also swooped up during the Great Toilet Paper Raids of April 2020!!. This is not as silky but it is 10x better at keeping me fresh, cool, and dry!!! And the scent is fabulous!! Only issue is that the bottles are small...but then again you don't need as much! Good-bye Johnson's, Hello Gold Bond!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Basic, safe, mild formula that works. Kaolin (an absorbent clay) and tapioca starch keep you dry, while zinc oxide kills bacteria and protects the skin. I mix this with coconut oil and a little baking soda to make a paste and it makes a natural deodorant that works better than anything I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: wayyyyyy better baby powder!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this powder dispenses, I feel like the not only is the powder better than other brands but it also distributes evenly and I feel like there is less wasted everywhere! I'm definitely making the switch to this powder only!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very irritated by the diaper. I tried to use a special popular cream with zinc, but it didn't work, and it only got worse. While I was waiting for an appointment from the doctor to solve this problem, I decided to try this baby powder. And lo! Everything went exactly in 3 days! Easy to use, even without getting your hands dirty. I liked it, I recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A grown-ups best friend too.
customer_reviews.text: Great for relief from clammy skin, after bath for bedtime or before going out into summer's heat and humidity. A summer time staple for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Nation

customer_reviews.title: Well, that was excruciatingly painful
customer_reviews.text: What a horrifying experience I had with this. I was a bit worried by how strong the scent was, but decided to try it anyway. Moments later I was jumping into a cold shower trying to remove as much as possible as I broke out in a painful rash. If you have skin which is at all sensitive STAY AWAY from this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: The Office Troll

customer_reviews.title: Stays on better to keep skin drier and more protected
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other baby powders, Gold Bond Cornstarch Plus Baby Powder stays on the skin. Other powders flake off or clump up when wet. So Gold Bond Cornstarch Plus Baby Powder helps keep skin dryer to prevent chafing. It also smells good, but is not overpowering - a nice fresh baby scent.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Buchko

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for older children still in pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my older child who has a severe disability. She has sensitive skin and gets rashes in her bottom very quickly and easily. She's not a fan of the creams anymore. We found this and she loves it. It keeps her bottom dry and heals up any beginning rash or heat bumps. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: nice product in travel size container
customer_reviews.text: nice baby powder with pleasant aroma good size for travel, no talc
customer_reviews.author: kitty says

customer_reviews.title: Ideal size for travel
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find body powder for travel. The typical 1-oz size is not adequate and the 8-oz size is too bulky. This 4-oz product is perfect. I was concerned that the fragrance would be the typical "baby powder" but was pleasantly surprised. This has a very subtle, soft floral fragrance and is not medicinal-smelling like the standard Gold Bond powder.
customer_reviews.author: n1cf2

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a baby powder to use for my son other than Johnson’s baby products and powder. It works well for my son when he gets a little irritated. When he has a real bad diaper rash I use Desitin. But this powder is great for when he’s just mildly irritated. There really is no smell. It seems to help. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Soothing!
customer_reviews.text: My baby had a rash for a week after getting out of the NICU and this powder soothed his little butt very quickly. His diaper rash was the type that needed to be dried out so zinc ointment alone wouldn’t do the trick. So I would rub ointment and then add this powder over it and it worked so effectively. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: suzette

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years! I have periodic problems with loose stools. Using this powder on my butt clears up soreness quickly! My only issue is that I can only find it in 4 oz size, should be a larger size available.
customer_reviews.author: gemmie7

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye to raw smelly skin!!
customer_reviews.text: No one told me the cons of having a cute chunky baby. My newborn neck rolls would stink and have a white sticky substance between them then his armpits and thighs began to do the same. This powder fixed that problem after first application!! It dried up and healed the raw creases and ate up any future odors.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok substitute for regular talc based Gold Bond
customer_reviews.text: I've used regular Gold Bond powder for after shower application for many years and was hoping to try this out as an alternative to using talc based products. It works, slightly not as well, and the scent isn't super desirable in my opinion. It is trying to smell like baby powder, but ends up smelling a bit like a stale laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: tvboy88

customer_reviews.title: The best powder for babies!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this with my first and will never go back. It works wonders (especially on chubby babies to help keep everything dry) by clearing rashes and keeping clean. It is hard to find in stores for some reason so I order here!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Best powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder is much better than talcum powder because of the corn starch. I've already brought a few more for my daughter and Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great dusting powder for grownups
customer_reviews.text: This powder helps to keep me cool and dry on hot days and when working out. I love that it’s talc free with only a few ingredients. The scent not great, but it’s very light and so I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: God sent
customer_reviews.text: GET IT FOR YOUR BABY’s BUM!! My newborn had an anal fisher plus constipation. My poor baby! As I was telling a gf what was going on, someone over heard and recommended this. So glad and I’m so thankful cause it was the only thing that helped. Ordered 15+ bottles after I saw instant improvement
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Best powder on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this powder for many years. It is so good that after I shower and use it on my armpits I actually don't need deodorant. The price form this seller is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for prepping your body for waxing.
customer_reviews.text: Great powder, I use it on my body to prep it for waxing and it's great! It absorbs the moisture in my skin which makes it easier for the wax to pull the hair off of my body. Highly recommended to other fellow waxers like me!
customer_reviews.author: 7Avocado40

customer_reviews.title: Baby bum healed within 48 hrs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's daycare provider told me about this powder. My daughter has only has diaper rash 3x, and 2 out of the 3x, I have used this powder. The burnt flower method is only second to this powder because I was so surprised by how quickly my baby healed. My son had a slight bout of rash developing and I immediately put this on him. The rash goes away completely within 48 hours, and baby should be completely healed within 2-5 days. I swear by this stuff now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Rids of dipper rashes super fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product, gets rid of rashes super fast. We use this almost every day. Keeps my baby’s but soft and rash free. Super recommended. Last time i bought two and lasted for about a month and a half
customer_reviews.author: chegue

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to Scent
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a non-talc medicated powder. I often use the talc form of Gold Bond and worry about breathing talc in. Well, turns out that I am having more problems with scent of the medicated baby powder. I gave the reminder of it away.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I like gold bond products. This is what I was looking for. It’s keeps you cool in the summer and I glad it can mes in a compact size for traveling.

customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: The Only powder I use
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder better than any I have tried. I’ve been using it for quite a while. Does not have talc in it either.

customer_reviews.title: Not a corn husk but it works
customer_reviews.text: Used for making silicone molds. Work a little too well. Haven't tested it where it matters though. Not warm enough outside yet

customer_reviews.title: Great price and did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a talc free option for getting oil out of clothes and this did the job. The price was great too! Small enough for easy travel/storage, but enough to last a while. So glad I bought this.

customer_reviews.title: No stick on my slappy butt.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my husband's butt silicone toy. Got the stickiness right out. Now I can slap it and not have a sticky residue on my hand.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This powder works great for my 2 month old. I tried many other diaper rash creams, this works way better.

customer_reviews.title: Good for diaper area!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good for babies. I have used this for my child who is two now ever since he was a few months old. This not only prevents redness but makes it better. I will use it here and there if no redness appears in his diaper area. But once I see the red skin- I apply it. I
customer_reviews.author: Parminder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The only kind I use on my son! Regular baby powder doesn't work like this stuff! It keeps him dry and helps to dry his bottom out during a rash for ointment.

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than we thought
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is ok but the bottle and quantity is really quite small.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: It has a smell I am unable to describe. It is not a medicated smell. It keeps you dry but not as dry as the talc.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, fresh scent.
customer_reviews.text: Fresh scent, easy to travel with. I bought two so it’s going to last a while. Keeps my sons butt dry for the most part. And his little neck.

customer_reviews.title: Gold bond
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this Powder dont leave a residue. Smells great & itkeeps u super dry. Iwill be ordering more ty

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: The scent was so strong that I didn’t even try it in baby. I sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: All good. I use daily. Would like to see this product in a larger volume.

customer_reviews.title: Great Preventer of Diaper Rash
customer_reviews.text: Had to find a replacement zinc oxide powder after the J&J asbestos thing. This stuff is even better!

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent

customer_reviews.title: The boys will be kept dry
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had no scent but it keeps my feet and family jewels dry after showering at the gym!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me feeling fresh
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for years, does what it is supposed to do.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This did the job! My baby’s neck was pilling and wet from constant skin to skin rubbing and contact. Within the first use, I saw a huge difference and after a couple uses, her neck healed completely. I still continue to use it as preventative measure.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best baby powder my husband and I have found. It has worked quickly for us when our little one has a red bum. I have purchased this several times and plan to continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Great body powder.
customer_reviews.text: Great scented baby powder that does not clump like other name brands. Perfect for every day use and does the job.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to try because I couldn't beat the price. It's working well. No complaining.

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.text: Good size for only $3/$4. And AWESOME that is doesn't containt TALC.

customer_reviews.title: Diaper rash who?
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. Keeps my babies butt dry. Is two months and hasn’t had a diaper rash yet (fingers crossed). The only thing that I would change is the scent. Has more of a grandma-ish scent instead of baby scent.

customer_reviews.title: Good products . Quality & Cost all good

customer_reviews.text: Struggled many poopy diapers in a short span of time and began to fight a rash. product_meta.title: Gold Bond CORNST Plus Baby PWD Size: 4 OZ
product_meta.description: Gold Bond cornstarch plus medicated baby powder, triple action relief, It helps prevent and treat diaper rash. It also helps relieve diaper rash with a combination of three effective skin protecting ingredients that soothes, protects and softens babys delicate skin, Absorbs moisture and forms a protective barrier to repel moisture.
feature_bullets: MEDICATED BABY POWDER: Powder your baby, or baby yourself! Our Medicated Cornstarch Plus Baby Powder protects against chafing, diaper rash, & other minor skin irritations, so you & your baby are happy.

PREVENT DIAPER RASH: Our triple action relief helps temporarily protect chafed skin, guards against wetness & relieves minor skin irritations due to diaper rash. Keep your baby happy, dry, & rash free.
THERAPUETIC SKIN CARE: Gold Bond products feature a unique triple action formula of ingredients proven to help relieve itching, absorb moisture, & control odor for fast-acting, long lasting comfort.
GOLD BOND : In addition to our baby powders, Gold Bond also makes medicated & non-medicated body powders, skin creams, lotions, & ointments. From first aid to foot care, we've got you covered.
HEALING SINCE 1908: For over a century Gold Bond products have provided soothing relief to the whole family, from baby's first bath & powder, to eczema or psoriasis relief, to lotion for dry skin.
